features.title: Supports STEM-Oriented Thinking
features.content: As children grow, Qblox introduces real 3D reasoning: how shapes connect, how balance works, and how design choices affect the structure. It gives them early exposure to the type of thinking used in engineering.

features.title: Helps Young Kids Practice Hand Skills
features.content: The large cubes are simple to grab and connect. They encourage young children to use both hands together, improving coordination, precision, and confidence while building.

features.title: Encourages Collaborative Play
features.content: Qblox allows several people to work on the same model from different sides. It fits naturally into classrooms, therapy environments, and family settings where building becomes a shared activity.

features.title: Three-Direction Connection System
features.content: Each cube connects in three perpendicular directions, enabling stable 3D structures that can extend outward and upward. This capability distinguishes Qblox from standard blocks or magnetic tiles.
